00006 GraphPlotter::GraphPlotter()
00007 {
00008         plotterStream = popen("gnuplot -persist -background white","w");
00009         if (!plotterStream)
00010         {
00011                 cerr << "Couldn't open connection to gnuplot" << endl;
00012                 return;
00013         }
00014 }

00017 GraphPlotter::~GraphPlotter()
00018 {
00019     // Wait a little before closing gnuplot stream.
00020     // Quick programs can otherwise have the plot closed before it's actually
00021     // displayed anything.
00022     sleep(1);
00023 
00024     clearPlot();
00025         if (pclose(plotterStream) == -1)
00026         {
00027                 cerr << "Problem closing communication to gnuplot" << endl;
00028                 return;
00029         }
00030 }

00034 void GraphPlotter::clearPlot()
00035 {      
00036         if (tempList.size() > 0)
00037         {
00038                 for (unsigned int i = 0; i < tempList.size(); i++)
00039                 {
00040                         remove(tempList[i].c_str());
00041                 }
00042                 tempList.clear();
00043         }
00044 }
00045 
00046 void GraphPlotter::sendCommand(const char *command, ...)
00047 {
00048         int MAX_BUFFER = 4096;
00049         va_list ap;
00050         char cmd[MAX_BUFFER];
00051         va_start(ap, command);
00052         vsprintf(cmd, command, ap);
00053         va_end(ap);
00054         strcat(cmd, "\n");
00055         fputs(cmd, plotterStream);
00056     fflush(plotterStream);
00057 }

00060 void GraphPlotter::setYLabel(const string label)
00061 {
00062         ostringstream cmdstr;
00063         cmdstr << "set xlabel \"" << label << "\"";
00064         sendCommand(cmdstr.str().c_str());
00065 }

00074 void GraphPlotter::plotPoints(const vec &x, const vec &y, const string title, const pointStyle ps, const plotColor pc)
00075 {
00076         ofstream tmp;
00077         ostringstream cmdstr;
00078         char name[] = "/tmp/scratchGraphPlotterXXXXXX";
00079         string seriesTitle = title;
00080 
00081         if(x.size() != y.size())
00082         {
00083             cerr << "GraphPlotter::plotPoints : Vectors x and y must be of same length" << endl;
00084                 return;
00085         }
00086 
00087         if(mkstemp(name) == -1)
00088         {
00089                 cerr << "Cannot create temporary file: exiting plot" << endl;
00090                 return;
00091         }
00092 
00093         tmp.open(name);
00094         if(tmp.fail() || tmp.bad() || !tmp.is_open())
00095         {
00096                 cerr << "Cannot create temorary file: exiting plot" << endl;
00097                 return;
00098         }
00099 
00100         tempList.push_back(name);
00101 
00102         for(int i = 0; i < x.size(); i++)
00103         {
00104                 tmp << x(i) << " " << y(i) << endl;
00105         }
00106         tmp.flush();    
00107         tmp.close();
00108 
00109         if (tmp.fail()) {
00110             cerr << "Error closing gnuplot data file." << endl;
00111             return;
00112         }
00113 
00114         if(tempList.size() > 1)
00115         {
00116                 cmdstr << "replot ";
00117         }
00118         else
00119         {
00120                 cmdstr << "plot ";
00121         }
00122 
00123         if(title == "")
00124         {
00125                 seriesTitle = "untitled";
00126         }
00127 
00128         cmdstr << "\"" << name << "\" title \"" << seriesTitle << "\" with ";
00129 
00130         if(ps == LINE)
00131         {
00132                 cmdstr << "lines" << " lt " << pc;
00133         }
00134         else
00135         {
00136                 cmdstr << "points pt " << ps << " lt " << pc;
00137         }
00138         cerr << cmdstr.str().c_str() << endl;
00139 
00140         sendCommand(cmdstr.str().c_str());
00141 }
